title: Song of the snows
creator_credit: Films Division, Government of India, K Khandpur and N.S. Thapa
brief_description: Out of the Himalayas rise the myths and legends, literature and culture of India. Shows the physical formation of snow, icicles, glaciers and rivers. This great mountain range is a challenge to mountaineers, a haven to pilgrims, and a source of immense beauty to all who come within its shadow.
creator_credit_for_label: Films Division, Government of India, K Khandpur and N.S. Thapa
